title: Argentina forces out 2 HSBC Argentina president, VP, gives 24 hours to name replacements
content:
The bank cited current HSBC Argentina president Gabriel Martino's alleged failure to establish the necessary controls to prevent money laundering and financing of terrorism as the reason for the decision. 

Industries: Bank 
Referenced Companies: HSBC Bank Argentina SA (SNL Inst. Key: 4251597), Central Bank of Argentina (SNL Inst. Key: 4401035), (HSBA) HSBC Holdings (SNL Inst. Key: 113876)
